author: Suzanne Collins
title: The Hunger Games
description: A thrilling dystopian novel set in a post-apocalyptic society where teenagers are forced to compete in a brutal televised battle for survival.

author: James Dashner
title: The Maze Runner
description: A gripping science fiction novel that follows a group of teenagers trapped in a mysterious maze, as they struggle to uncover its secrets and find a way to escape.

author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
title: The Great Gatsby
description: A classic American novel that delves into the extravagant and complex world of Jay Gatsby, a wealthy socialite, and explores themes of love, wealth, and the American Dream in 1920s New York.
